title: Action by agency upon request for hearing
context: ยง576E-8 Action by agency upon request for hearing. Upon receipt of a hearing request, the agency may contact the parties and attempt to reach an agreed disposition. If no agreed disposition can be obtained, the matter shall be referred to a hearings officer for contested case proceedings. [L 1988, c 154, pt of ยง2; am L 1994, c 105, ยง9; am L 1995, c 191, ยง1]
